user draws on a blank HTML canvas featuring a menu with standard paint color and paintbrush width controls, and can draw an image on the canvas. Clicking the "send" button creates a correctly styled CSS/JS HTML page based on the user submitted drawing, and takes the user to that page.
Make sure everything is kept in a single HTML file with embedded CSS and JS in a single code block to be used as a web app.
